overview: • Currently Quintessentially Group’s Licensing Director responsible for the international expansion of the Quintessentially group of companies. • 4 year qualified lawyer – practised in commercial and IP law at SJ Berwin LLP and Collyer Bristow LLP. • Experienced in advising various high profile individuals and businesses from FMCG and entertainment sectors including Philip Morris International, Hilton Hotels, the Mercury Music Prize, Sara Brightman, David Arnold.
